title: Expand the beta Console/BoU to run on Server 2016
body: This could be a useful feature for environments where you need to support mixed environments, that include linux machines and windows machines side by side---(vision in this case being management scripts that can run in both environments without a lot of refactoring)

comments.body: would love to have something like this available so I could install it on our build servers. I work in a mixed js /.net environment, and many of the js devs use bash in their build process, would be lovely if we could run those on our windows build server.
